div.p: Flag_of_Lesotho.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 900 × 600 pixels, file size: 5 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

dl.dd:
You are free:
to share – to copy, distribute and transmit the work
to remix – to adapt the work

Under the following conditions:
attribution – You must attribute the work in the manner specified by the author or licensor (but not in any way that suggests that they endorse you or your use of the work).
share alike – If you alter, transform, or build upon this work, you may distribute the resulting work only under the same or similar license to this one.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:11, 1 May 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 23:25, 30 January 2007

td.span: (rm intrinsic border and enlarge viewbox; if you want a bordered version of this image, you can upload a separate SVG with an intrinsic border)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:19, 29 December 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 23:16, 29 December 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 03:25, 5 October 2006

td.span: (The Flag Research Center sent a new drawing of the hat, I made modified the hat to match their sketch)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:44, 3 October 2006

td.span: (Brand new national flag of Lesotho, as announced by the Government http://www.lesotho.gov.ls/articles/2006/Programme_40th_Independence.php and http://www.lesotho.gov.ls/articles/2006/Senators_New_Flag.php The flag was drawn to the specs given by the Leso)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:22, 24 February 2006

td.span: (Improved version, e-mailed to uploader by author of xrmap, with modifications, PD)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:24, 24 November 2005

td.span: (Flag of Lesotho from the [http://openclipart.org/ Open Clip Art] website. {{PD-OpenClipart}} Category:SVG flags)
